abstract: The accusations cast a shadow over the country’s web-based finance industry, a lucrative sector that the authorities say is the subject of a growing number of fraud cases.
snippet: The accusations cast a shadow over the country’s web-based finance industry, a lucrative sector that the authorities say is the subject of a growing number of fraud cases.
lead_paragraph: HONG KONG — A Chinese online finance company bilked investors out of more than $7.6 billion, spent lavishly on gifts and salaries and buried the evidence, according to local authorities who described the operation as an enormous Ponzi scheme.

headline.main: Online Lender Ezubao Took $7.6 Billion in Ponzi Scheme, China Says
headline.print_headline: Online Finance Company Took $7.6 Billion in Ponzi Scheme, China Says
